name: 2-Click Scrolls
description:
<----- STORY ----->

"The EVIL game creator, MysticalGreen, has stolen the magic keyboard so that you, the player, cannot beat the game. But you have figured out another way to play the game and get back the magic keyboard. You will have to use the mouse, and only the mouse, to play through the levels and retrieve back the magic keyboard."

<----- HOW TO PLAY ----->

Mouse cursor controls the left and right movement of the player. Left click is to jump and right click makes certain objects disappear from different levels.
